content.text:
# Draft:King & Queen

King & Queen is an Indian romance musical action thriller war comedy film. The film stars Akshay Kumar, Sunil Shetty, Preity Zinta, Shilpa Shetty in lead roles, with Anil Kapoor, Salman Khan, Manisha Koirala, Tusshar Kapoor, Ashutosh Rana and Rani Mukerji in supporting roles.
Cast
*Akshay Kumar
*Sunil Shetty
*Preity Zinta
*Shilpa Shetty
*Anil Kapoor
*Salman Khan
*Manisha Koirala
*Tusshar Kapoor
*Ashutosh Rana
*Rani Mukerji
*Johnny Lever
*Rajpal Yadav
*Gulshan Grover
*Anupam Kher
